definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Objective To comparatively study two model-making of cerebral infarction in the territory of middle cerebral artery in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究比较两种局灶性脑缺血模型的制作。

sentences.english: What Causes Seizure in Focal Epilepsy?
sentences.chinese: 什么原因导致局灶性癫痫发作？

sentences.english: Focal ischemia also could raise the neurogenesis in hippocampus dentate gyrus .
sentences.chinese: 局灶性脑缺血后亦可增加海马齿状回内神经发生。

sentences.english: Focal atrial fibrillation treated by circumferential radiofrequency catheter ablation of pulmonary vein orifice.
sentences.chinese: 导管射频肺静脉口环状消融治疗局灶性心房颤动。

sentences.english: The focal cerebral ischemic injury was carried out using middle cerebral artery occlusion (MCAO) model.
sentences.chinese: 用MCAO模型造成大鼠局灶性脑缺血损伤。

sentences.english: To investigate CT features and value of diagnosis of focal organizing pneumonia ( FOP ).
sentences.chinese: 探讨局灶性机化性肺炎的CT特点及诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical discrimination and diagnosis of focal tumour-like pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨局灶性肿块样肺炎临床诊断与鉴别。

sentences.english: In malignant nephrosclerosis, the kidney demonstrates focal small hemorrhages.
sentences.chinese: 恶性肾硬化时，肾脏出现局灶性出血。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the feature of joint osteochondral lesions under the magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析局灶性关节软骨损伤的MRI所见。

sentences.english: About the focal signet ring cells, I favor frozen artifact.
sentences.chinese: 至于局灶性印戒细胞，我认为是冰冻假象。

sentences.english: Focal neurological features including hemiparesis, sensory loss, visual field deficits.
sentences.chinese: 局灶性神经表现，包括轻偏瘫，感觉缺失，视野缺损。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnostic value of three-dimensional color doppler on focalized renal infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨三维彩色超声在局灶性肾梗塞中的应用。

definition: axon (long thin axis of nerve cell)
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
